pros: Mage with double jump

Few buffs
  • Buffs have a long duration too (4 mins)
Cute summon that follows you and grants Magic Attack
Has a skill that regenerates MP, Controlled Burn
Has a revive, Phoenix Run
Cygnus Knight characters do not need Mastery Books
cons: Consumes a lot of MP ( A LOT!!)

Main attack Orbital Flame is a bit clunky
  • For some reason, the damage it dealt felt really lackluster compared to how it looked especially the up attack
Revive skill is a buff that has a duration and can expire

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +30%] [ +5% when wand is equipped]
Final Damage: [ +30%] [ +50%]
Ignore Elemental Resistance: [ +10%]

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Oz to become a Blaze Wizard

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete a series of quests in 4th Job

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Orbital Flame - Range, Guard Break and Split Attack
  • Blazing Extinction - Reinforce and Add Attack

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to TajMaJon for their help in making this overview!

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 0, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 3

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Intelligence increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
details:
Can be activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Shoots a projectile which can be directed using the Arrow Keys
details: Initially, you can only shoot out one projectile

primary.name: Flame Bite
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 38, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Sends out a burst of flames forward

primary.name: Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +10
primary.desc: Using will temporarily summon a Flame Elemental that follows you that provides a Magic Attack buff

primary.name: Firewalk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Jump in the input direction.\n[Passive Effect - Defense: +100]
details: [Passive]: Grants flat DEF

Can be activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Fire Repulsion
primary.shortDesc: 85% of damage taken goes to MP instead of HP.

primary.name: Natural Talent
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Greater Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 1
details: Increases %Damage of attack and allows you to throw up to 2 projectiles

primary.name: Flame Vortex
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 2, Number of Enemies pushed back: 6.
primary.desc: Pushes enemies back with a vortex of flames

primary.name: Ignition
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Duration: 300 sec, Probability to activate [Ignition] effect: 100%.\nIgnition: Duration: 10 sec, Damage: 220% per sec, AoE Damage at the end of duration: 240%
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to set enemies on fire
details: At the end of the burn, enemies will explode damaging itself

primary.name: Flashfire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Trail Duration: 100 sec, Reuse skill during this time to teleport to your original location.
primary.desc: Places down a flame at your position that you can teleport back to by pressing the Skill Key again

primary.name: Word of Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Duration: 300 sec, Magic ATT: +20, Attack Speed: +2 level
primary.desc: Grants flat Attack and increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Controlled Burn
primary.shortDesc: Recovers 99% of your MP upon casting.\nCooldown: 60 sec

primary.name: Greater Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +20
details: Increases Attack provided

primary.name: Spell Control
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +10, Magic Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Grand Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 2. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +20%
details: Increases %Damage of attack and allows you to throw up to 3 projectiles
Now deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Flame Tempest
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 2, Number of Enemies pushed away: 8.
primary.desc: Lashes out flames in both directions that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Cinder Maelstrom
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Duration: 20 sec, Blows up one enemy to deal 300% Damage, Pulls 8 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Causes an enemy to grow large and pull in nearby enemies

primary.name: Phoenix Run
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 1800 sec, Teleports backward at the moment of impact to recover 50% HP, Ignore Damage Duration: 3 sec\nCooldown 1800 sec
primary.desc: When hit by a fatal attack, you will not die but instead heal back a percentage of your HP back
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Grand Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +30
details: Increases Attack provided

primary.name: Liberated Magic
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: +130%, Final Damage: +30%

primary.name: Burning Focus
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Brilliant Enlightenment
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases INT by 60.

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec
details: To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete the quest 'The Alliance Gathers' at Lv. 120

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Final Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 43, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 305%, Number of Attacks: 2. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +40%.
details: Increases %Damage of attack and allows you to throw up to 4 projectiles
Increases additional %Damage against regular monsters

primary.name: Blazing Extinction
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 10 sec, Damage: 310%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Launches a fireball that slowly moves and attacks nearby enemies

primary.name: Towering Inferno
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 115, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 10, Final Damage increased by 90% for enemies hit by Ignition. Can immediately detonate Ignition, but not cast it.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Releases a blast of fire at your location
details:
Deals increased %Final Damage to enemies that are affected with the Ignition burn
  • will also instantly to detonate and explode

primary.name: Fires of Creation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 115, Duration: 300 sec, Additional MP Cost: 105%, Ignore DEF: +30%. [Ignition] effects: Elemental Resistance: -10%.\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Increases %MP Costs, %Ignore Def and causes Ignition debuff to reduce %Elemental Resistance of enemy
details:
A lion will be summoned if you press on the Skill Key
  • If you press the Down Key while pressing this Skill Key, a fox will be summoned

primary.name: Burning Conduit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 115, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +60% and Attack Speed: +-1 stages when you are on the pentacle\nCooldown: 45 sec
primary.desc: Creates a zone that increases %Damage and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) when you are within the zone

primary.name: Flame Barrier
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Duration: 15 sec, Damage Intake: -50%. Explodes at the end, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 350%\nCooldown: 90 sec
primary.desc: Creates a shield that reduces damage taken. At the end of the buff, the barrier explodes dealing damage

primary.name: Final Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +40
details: Increases Attack provided

primary.name: Pure Magic
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Final Damage: +50%, Magic Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Wild Blaze
primary.shortDesc: Ignition Final DoT: +60%, All abnormal status and elemental resistance: +30%.

hyperActive.name: Dragon Blaze
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Max Duration: 2 sec, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: Up to 6 while the key is held.\nUpon releasing the key or after the attack has finished, attacks 10 more times for 500% Damage. Can immediately detonate Ignition, but not cast it.\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Releases a barrage of fireballs forward that damages a single enemy
details: If the enemy has the Ignition burn, it will detonate and explode

hyperActive.name: Cataclysm
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 860%, Number of Attacks: 7. Invincible during casting. Can immediately detonate Ignition, but not cast it.\nCooldown: 100 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a large fireball that damages enemies on screen while causing any Ignition burn to detonate and explode
details: You are invincible during this time

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Cygnus class or Mihile in the party

fifthMain.name: Orbital Inferno
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 655%, Number of Attacks: 6, Ignore Enemy DEF: 50%\nCooldown: 5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Hurls out a giant fireball which can be directed using the Arrow Keys
details: Attack is unaffected by Damage Reflect and has additional %Ignore Def

fifthMain.name: Savage Flame
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Passive Effects: Gain 1 Flame Charge for each enemy struck that is afflicted by Ignition, up to 6 flames.
Active Effect - MP Cost: 800, Flame Cost: 2+ charges, Cooldown: 20 sec
[Blazing Lion]: MActivates explosion 5 times, hitting up to 15 enemies for 400% damage 12 times. Increases Final Damage by 35% for every Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
[Flame Fox]: Creates 8 foxfires that randomly strike 8 enemies within range. Each foxfire deals 500% damage and can regenerate up to 7 times. Regenerates 2 more time for each 1 Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
fifthMain.desc: Only usable when is active. The attack will differ depending on which animal was summoned
details: Enemies who are debuffed with the Ignition burn will grant 1 Flame Charge which is used to cast Savage Flame. A minimum of 2 Fire Charges is required to cast
[Lion Attack]: Launches forward dealing massive damage and increases %Final Damage depending on remaining Fire Charges
[Fox Attack]: Creates fireballs that attack nearby enemies. The fireballs will regenerate and attack again depending on how many Fire Charges were used to cast

fifthMain.name: Inferno Sphere
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, consumes 1 Phoenix Feather every sec
Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 7, Additional Critical Rate: +50%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%
1 Phoenix Feather will be prepared every 12 sec. You can have up to 15 feathers.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Damages enemies within the circle when held down
details: The attack has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore Def
This skill has a special resource called Phoenix Feathers which are prepared every 12 seconds and you can hold up to 15 feathers
This skill costs 1 feather every second to cast

fifthMain.name: Salamander Mischief
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, Salamander Summon Duration: 60 sec, Damage: 300%, Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 7. In a single action, consumes 100 MP and attacks by bouncing up to 12 times.
Obtain Ember every time Salamander's attack hits. Final Damage of Salamander's attack increases by 1% for every 1 Ember. Up to 40 Ember can be obtained.
When Salamander disappears, Magic ATT increases by 15 for 30 sec, and Magic ATT additionally increases by 2 for every 1 Ember.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a salamander that continuously pounces at a single target
details: The salamander will return to you once an enemy has been hit 12 times or if you travel too far away

Each time the salamander hits an enemy, it gains 1 Ember which increases the %Final Damage of the attack
  • The max amount of Embers that can be collected increases based on the Skill Level
  • When the salamander disappears, you will gain a Magic Attack buff based on the amount of Embers collected
The salamander will prioritize boss monsters and enemies with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and will not trigger

meta: Blaze Wizard is an INT mage class part of the Cygnus Knights. Blaze Wizard are known for their unique playstyle of juggling fireballs to attack
